hero.description: Navigating through the galaxies of code, I craft applications like digital exploration vessels. Each project is a space mission driven by innovation and creativity.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer driven by innovation
about.description1: With over 3 years of experience in web development, I specialize in building modern and high-performance applications. My expertise covers the entire technical stack, from frontend to backend.
about.description2: I am always on the lookout for new technologies and best practices to deliver innovative solutions and exceptional user experiences.

list.title: E-Commerce Platform
list.description: Complete e-commerce platform with product management, cart, online payments (Stripe), and admin dashboard.

list.title: Manage Automaton
list.description: App to perform operations on finite automata (DFA/NFA): string testing, conversion, simplification, and more.

list.title: Image Compression App
list.description: Image compression app with drag-and-drop and no visible quality loss.

list.title: QR Code Generator
list.description: Simple and customizable QR code generator app.

list.title: 3R Platform
list.description: Awareness platform for recycling and circular economy.

list.title: Student ID Generator
list.description: Modern app to quickly generate custom student ID cards.

list.title: Propelize (Car Sales Platform)
list.description: Used car sales platform with advanced filters, notifications, and automated testing.

list.title: Web Developer Intern
list.description: Contributed to the redesign of a SaaS platform, developed front-end and back-end modules, and collaborated within an agile team.

list.title: Full Stack Developer (Freelance)
list.description: Developed web and mobile applications for various clients (e-commerce, dashboards, showcase sites). Tech stack: React, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS.

list.title: Personal Project: 3D Portfolio with Next.js
list.description: Built my interactive portfolio featuring 3D animations, a space theme, and Lottie integration. Focused on user experience and performance.

list.title: BACHELOR DEGREE IN INFORMATION SYSTEM AND SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
